name: Lunch Rush! (Web Adapted)
description:
Lunch Rush V1.1 - Adapted for Web!

Be the first to get to the lunchroom--no matter what! Battle your friends for the right to be King of the Cafeteria.

2-player only and adapted to work for the web.

Original Game (Chillennium Game Jam 2016): https://egoftcp.itch.io/lunch-rush

Special Recognition in Programming

By team WhiskeyEggnog:

* Austin Henry

* William Bracho Blok

* Austin Ruff

* Eric Gonzalez
